text: The term Montenegrin literature may refer to: * Literature of Montenegro, the entire (historical and modern) corpus of literature created on the territory covered by modern Montenegro, written in various languages of the region (Medieval Latin, Church Slavic, Serbian, Italian, Albanian, Croatian, Romani, Bosniak, Montenegrin) * Literature in Montenegrin language, literature created in Montenegrin language, a newly codified South Slavic language == See also == * Montenegro (disambiguation) * Montenegrin (disambiguation) * Montenegrins (disambiguation)
title: Montenegrin literature
